column5: Brand new purpose built one story house with 4 bedrooms and 3 and 1/2 baths in the new Harpers Preserve in Conroe Texas. It's moments away from The Woodlands Mall and attractions.   There is a communal park, swimming pool and gym.   The house is an airy open plan space with 2 living rooms and a study. It has a 2 car garage and ample parking space on the front yard.
